tldr: Affected versions of this package improperly decoded HTML entities (`<`, `>`) and parsed user-controlled JSON without sanitization, enabling stored or reflected XSS. By injecting malicious HTML/JS into `description` or `raw` blocks, an attacker could have entities decoded into executable markup and rendered by the client, leading to script execution, session theft, or UI manipulation.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@evershop/evershop` library to the patch version.
